Html:
Yes, I have a replica server in my WSUS setup and I can approve updates using the upstream server, but when accessing the same updates using the downstream replica the URL is highlighted red.
And the path also does not exist on the replica server, even though the update will show as approved. Wondering what could be causing that.
I am using SSL as well for both servers.
I wound up fixing this by dragging the .cab file to the correct directory in the wsus content folder. Kind of a pain, but it works after sync's and things of that nature.
